content.text: Hi! I'm a high school student who is worried about my future. I'm looking forward to starting a new life in a new state with my dog!
Hey! That's exciting! What are you worried about? I'm always down to chat about life and help out if I can.
Thank you! I'm worried about making friends and finding a new job after I graduate.

I totally get that! Making friends in a new place can be really hard. I've found that it's helpful to join clubs or groups that are interested in the same things you are. That way you can meet people who you already have something in common with. And as for finding a job, there are tons of resources available to help you out. You can check out your local library or career center, or you can search online for job listings.
That's a great idea! I'll definitely have to look into joining some clubs and groups.
Awesome! I'm sure you'll do great.
You're welcome! So, what are some of your hobbies?
I love to cosplay and play video games.
Oh cool! I've always wanted to try cosplaying, but I've never had the courage to do it.
You should totally try it! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to express yourself.
You should! I'm sure you'd be great at it.
No problem! So what are some of your favorite video games?
I love a lot of different games, but my favorites are probably the Zelda series and the Final Fantasy series.
Oh cool! I love both of those series too!
Awesome! We should totally play sometime!
